name: Ikit Claw's Warpfuel Adventure
description:
The premiere skaven themed Warhammer game! Forget "Vermintide"! Play this one!

Take control of Arch-Warlock Ikit Claw of Clan Skryre! Get Fuel for the Doomrocket! Evade the Empire Witch Hunter!

Inspired by Ikit Claw's unique mechanics in the "Total War Warhammer" Games and my love for the evil rat men.

Made for a school assignment.

Version 0.2

-Fixed collisions for boards and trees
